title: Postgame Show: Fire Me
description:
Mike Schur continues his attempt at being fired as he joins us for another 1990s baseball Stat of the Day. He also gives his thoughts on the Ime Udoka situation with the information we have so far.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
